name.ja: トリックスターバンド・ドラマチス

text.en:
2 "Trickstar" monsters
Your "Trickstar" Link Monsters that point to this card gain 1000 ATK. You can only use each of the following effects of "Trickstar Band Drummatis" once per turn. If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can add 1 "Trickstar" card from your Deck to your hand, with a different name from the cards you control and in your GY. If either player takes effect damage: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; change its ATK to 0.
